Title: SilverMedia
Description: SilverMedia is a Silverlight application for play music and video easily, online and out-of-browser. Actual version can read mp3, wmv, and wma files.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
SilverMedia is a Silverlight application for play music and video easily, online and out-of-browser. Actual version can read mp3, wmv, and wma files.

The Next version includes a time management, and a ergonomy a little better (like for loop visualisation).
More informations on www.aerilys.fr
Comments are welcome !
